name: 25th World Congress on Biotechnology
content: We are glad to invite you to the “25th World Congress on Biotechnology” which is going to be held on April 27-28, 2020 at Amsterdam, Netherlands. The theme of the conference is “Recognizing and Analyzing the modern ascensions in the field of Biotechnology”. Biotechnology-2020 is a 2-day event offering the Exhibition, at the venue to showcase the new and emerging technologies and have wider sessions involving Keynote presentation, Oral, YRF (student presentation), poster, e-poster presentations. World-renowned speakers and eminent delegates across the globe attending the conference, to share their valuable presentation on the most recent and advanced techniques, developments, technologies and relevant topics along the newest updates are the prominent features of the conference.
